entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Lambton Shores

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 6 this evening. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow or ice pellets. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Ice pellets or freezing rain beginning early in the afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. Temperature steady near zero.
